data.name: Ben Collins: Stunt Driver
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

World-renowned stunt driver Ben Collins takes you on a gripping, adrenaline-filled joy ride as he hunts for the perfect stunt car for a high-octane, Hollywood-style car chase. Cars such as the McLaren 650S, Aston Martin Vanquish, Ariel Nomad, Jaguar F- TYPE, and Ford Mustang are pushed to their absolute limits on Ben's mission, as he dices with death with planes and tanks in hot pursuit.
data.about_the_game: World-renowned stunt driver Ben Collins takes you on a gripping, adrenaline-filled joy ride as he hunts for the perfect stunt car for a high-octane, Hollywood-style car chase. Cars such as the McLaren 650S, Aston Martin Vanquish, Ariel Nomad, Jaguar F- TYPE, and Ford Mustang are pushed to their absolute limits on Ben's mission, as he dices with death with planes and tanks in hot pursuit.
data.short_description: World-renowned stunt driver Ben Collins takes you on a gripping, adrenaline-filled joy ride as he hunts for the perfect stunt car for a high-octane, Hollywood-style car chase.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7
  • Процессор: Intel Core 2 или аналогичный от AMD
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Дополнительно: Скорость соединения: 5 Мбит/с для 540p, 3 Мбит/с для 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 10
  • Процессор: Для воспроизведения HD 1080p рекомендуется процессор Intel Core i3+ или аналогичный от AMD
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
  • Дополнительно: Скорость соединения: 12 Мбит/с для 1080p или 8 Мбит/с для 720p.
